description.narrative: The Initiation Plan for Inclusive Growth 2019-2020 aims to formulate innovative projects to support Viet Nam in making IR 4.0 inclusive.

sector.narrative: Eradicate poverty in all its forms and dimensions

condition.narrative: UNDP as the Implementing Partner will comply with the policies, procedures and practices of the United Nations Security Management System (UNSMS.)

description.narrative: Number and quality (with opportunities for scaling up innovative solutions, partnership and resource mobilization) of project concept notes developed in close cooperation with relevant partners

comment.narrative: Non-existence of new (long-term/full scale) project concept notes/ documents on i) Anticipatory Governance for Inclusive IR4.0/inclusive IR4.0; ii) expanding private sector investment/SDG financing; iii) enhancing productivity and competitiveness and development of Viet Nam’s private sector/SMEs; iv) MDP monitoring and scaling up; v) financial inclusion (Government’s e- transfer of social assistance payments.

1.1.1. One roundtable with SEDS’s/SEDP’s related senior researchers and policy makers, aiming at sharing international experience on (i) experimentation approach for promoting entrepreneurship and innovations (ii) promoting innovations: Anticipatory governance experience. 1.1.2. Availability of a policy brief inclusive growth/inclusive IR4.0 (as inputs for SEDS/SEDP). 1.2.1. One report on Productivity and Competitiveness of Viet Nam’s Enterprises (Part 1 Manufacturing) produced. 1.2.2. One high level policy dialogue on Productivity and Competitiveness of Viet Nam’s Enterprises organized. 1.2.3. Availability of a report on experimentation of pilot technology assessment in food processing to support transition to inclusive IR4.0. 1.3.1. Availability of (i) a report on reviewing the current MDP’s methodology/indicators and proposing recommendations for adjustment in period 2021 – 2025; (ii) a project document providing technical assistance to application of (i) MDP measurement and (ii) Accelerator Lab approach for sustainable poverty reduction and Ethnic Minority development and under the two National Targeted Programs on Sustainable Poverty Reduction and Social Economic Development in Ethnic Minority and Mountainous areas (2021-2025). 1.3.2. Availability of a software and implementation guidelines on MDP data collection (applying IR4.0 technologies). 1.3.3. Availability of report for the launch of the Human Development Indices and Global Multidimensional Poverty Indicators: Viet Nam’s 2019 Statistical updates. 1.3.4. Consultation workshop and launch of the Human Development Indices and Global Multidimensional Poverty Indicators: Viet Nam’s 2019 Statistical updates conducted. 1.3.5. Availability of a project proposal on establishment of the National MDP Center to support the scaling up the application of MDP approach in Viet Nam and countries in the region.
